title: Rainbow Six Vegas 2 Patch 1.03 with NOCD exe
description:
Ok... here is the Rainbow 6 Vegas 2 1.03 patch.. with No CD exe

1) Copy all the files from Patch_R6V2_1.03 into your "Rainbow Six Vegas 2" directory

2) agree to all folder merges, agree to all file copy and replace.  Basically say yes to all... :)

3) play the game, cause its now patched to v1.03

Hope this simplified this for all...
